guidelines.taskSizing: Tasks should remain small, atomic, and as independent as possible.
guidelines.scaling: Create an additional sprint when a backlog would exceed ten tickets.

sprints.name: Sprint 1: SEO & Chat Agent Optimization
sprints.goal: Elevate organic visibility for targeted vehicle loan calculator queries while supplying structured content for chat agents.

acceptanceCriteria: Updated landing page metadata and copy references the targeted vehicle loan calculator keywords naturally.
Each vehicle type has a dedicated content section with plain-language explanations and comparison points.
Structured data (FAQ) published in the HTML head or body validates via common schema checkers.
Internal documentation captures the workstream along with risk assessment and validation steps.
themes: Refresh on-page metadata to emphasize priority loan calculator keywords.
Expand and organize vehicle-specific content sections for SEO and chat agent clarity.
Ship FAQPage JSON-LD with supporting styles and author the mitigation playbook.

sprints.name: Sprint 2: PRD Compliance Hardening
sprints.goal: Close the remaining MVP gaps so the vehicle loan calculator satisfies every base PRD requirement.

acceptanceCriteria: Calculator UI exposes price, down payment, trade-in value, fees, tax rate, APR, and term inputs with validation.
Frontend consumes the /api/quote endpoint so business logic lives in one place and honors trade-in and tax fields.
Affiliate and UTM metadata are persisted for both click tracking and submitted leads.
Automated tests cover the new quote, lead, and tracking scenarios.
themes: Extend the calculator UI to cover all PRD-mandated financial inputs.
Shift calculation responsibility to the /api/quote endpoint for consistency.
Persist affiliate attribution and UTM metadata across tracking and leads.
Backfill automated coverage for the new quote, tracking, and lead behaviors.
